```{r}
library(MASS)
Iris <- read.csv("bezedekIris.csv")
View(Iris)
attach(Iris)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
train <- sample(1:nrow(Iris), nrow(Iris)/2)
test <- -(train)
Class.test <- Class[test]
Iris.test <- Iris[test, ]
lda.fit <- lda(Class ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width + Petal.Length + Petal.Width, data = Iris, subset = train)
lda.pred <- predict(lda.fit, Iris.test)
lda.class <- lda.pred$class
table(lda.class, Class.test)
mean(lda.class != Class.test)
```
